data.title: Delicious local beers
data.text: Service here is great, beers are delicious, atmosphere is laid back and relaxing. Great place for beer enthusiasts to hang out.

data.title: Downtown brews...  Mmmmm
data.text: Nice brewery with dedicated history.  Good selection and all decked out for Halloween.  Careful, the bar staff is armed with a sword so no trouble please!  My wife had the Grapefruit IPA and I had the Munich Dunkel.  Both were very good with the Dunkel being surprisingly tart.  Easy downtown location offering flights and beer in a jar.  This brewery offers a small food menu with appetizers, salads and 10" pizzas.  Outside seating for the usually great weather too.

data.title: So much fun and great beer!
data.text: I happened to stumble across a Groupon for this place and was so pleasantly surprised! For seven dollars, I got a flight of beer – the Groupon was for two people but since I was alone, I got the flight as well as an additional beer of my choice. The beer selection was awesome, the atmosphere was so fun, and they had both indoor and outdoor seating. Adorable little flight classes available for sale as well. I really enjoyed myself  and I'm glad that I checked Groupon to find it! I would highly recommend if you are in the area stopping by this place.

data.title: Great brew
data.text: Wide selection of beers to try. Try pint glasses are so cool. Had to take one home. I liked the outside sitting area. Plenty of room for my group. Glad we made it here to try it out. We will be back the next time in town.

data.title: Beer trail
data.text: Awesome atmosphere here! Bartender is very knowledgeable and friendly! Most definitely have to do a flight to try it all. Throat Punch is one that you must try! I did not get the guy's name but he's from Ohio and he is awesome!

data.title: Great atmosphere!
data.text: Our dive club held our meeting there and loved it! Great place for groups and excellent customer service.

data.title: Would come back again and again
data.text: Great tasty beer, friendly staff, clean bathrooms and very comfy. They have lots of games to play on the back counter and Mario Cart on the TV.

data.title: Nice vibe brewery
data.text:
Wonderful place to stop in and
Grab a beer.laid back atmosphere
With nautical theme and a great
Selection of souvenirs.
Bartender on July 4th was
Superb.

data.title: Love the theme!
data.text:
St. Pete brewing was great! They have a nautical theme for all their beers which hits home with me since I work offshore.

Not only was the beer tasty, but they have matched all the other local breweries in their attempt to be a community establishment. The location is open to the street and they have ensured they have free entertainment for guests ... what brewery do you know has a nintendo system?!

Cant wait to go back with friends.

data.title: Walked from the water and market to visitr
data.text: We went to to Saturday morning market and then walked here to have a couple of good beers and it was busy!! We were able to sit outside although they do not mind if you come in with your dog. What we did not know was they serve food and they have dog biscuits for dogs! They serve delicious sweet potato fries.

data.title: Nice place to have a beer.
data.text: I was impressed but the variety. All made right there. I liked the ambiance as well. Went there with my wife for some beers and a small pizza.

data.title: Sample local brews in a downtown brewery
data.text: Downtown St Petersburg keeps seeing the addition of more cool places.  St Pete Brewing Co is one of those.  Interesting boho industrial warehouse decor.  The garage-like doors were wide open on the sunny spring afternoon we visited.  Relaxing customers chatted at tables outside.  There are tables and benches inside, too, but the feature is the long bar and the row of taps.  Toward the back are the large brewing and holding tanks.  It's a working brewery, so these are not just for show, unlike some places.  The staff is quite cordial, patient and knowledgeable about the individual brews.  Try a flight of 4 different beers.  Step outside your usual box. You can purchase growlers to go.  Check their website for events and specials.  Regularly scheduled are discounts for hospitality workers on Mondays, $5.50 Growler refills on Tuesdays, $4 pint Wednesdays, and Real American Heroes Thursday, offering discounts to military, courthouse employees, local attorneys, police officers, fire, EMS, healthcare and teachers.

data.title: Cool place
data.text:
Nice brewery close to downtown st Petersburg with some food options.
I orderded a flight of beer and tried 4 different flavors and there were all delicious..but what really makes this place special is the staff they were so nice and inviting that i felt right at home the entire time.

data.title: Good Brewery
data.text: Grab a Groupon and head over to taste some of the local beer. Great dive brewery in the downtown area.

data.title: One of our favorite locale breweries
data.text:
Always great service to go along with really good beer.  We particularly like the Goliath Grouper Imperial Stout and the Scottish Ale.  For those non beer drinkers, they carry a really yummy Strawberry-Lime Cider.  The owners are super friendly and seem to always be there helping out and working hard.  You can tell they want their patrons to be happy.  They want you to sample and they pour FULL beers.  Love how they really like their city as the names and histories of the beers along with decor show.  Not a super huge place, but well laid out with outdoor seating available. 
They also offer food delivery from the next door location- pizza, salads, hot pretzels, fish dip, etc.

data.title: Nice atmosphere.
data.text: We thought the place looked pretty cool.  We were not fans of the beers.  Hate to say that but, it's true.  We are pretty picky though.  With all the other beer places starting to explode in Florida, we probably would skip this place next time.  It's right on the main road so, it's easy and convenient.

data.title: A decent brewpub that should appeal to a wide audience
data.text: The feel and look of this place is like many bars, but certainly not unique or different.  While the beer is good to ok, the styles offered are fairly "standard, wide audience appeal."  IMHO there are no unique or seldom seen beer styles.  I do think their Milo's IPA is a very good and drinkable IPA.  Food is limited to pizza, two salads, and a few appetizers.  Not a culinary Mecca.  I was a bit turned off by the plastic utensils I received for eating my (lackluster) Brewers Salad.  On a positive note, the one bartender did a great job behind the bar.

data.title: Interesting local brews and friendly staff
data.text:
Good selection of local brews.  The Belgian Strong was especially tasty.  We enjoyed the taster (4 oz. samples of 4 beers for $6).  

The bartenders were friendly and knowledgeable.

data.title: Cool bar with good local beer
data.text: Good atmosphere, quite busy with a good beer menu, lots of board games for drinkers to play. Friendly bar staff, locally brewed beers not outstanding but reasonably good.

data.title: Fun afternoon with the Brains for Brews pub crawl
data.text: Spent the afternoon at St Pete Brewing with friends and had a great time. Good beer, good company, games and more.
